StoryElement.StoryElement: Good. All quiet on the Western front. This place really is amazing. I hate to just sneak out but . . . wow what a great smell! They must use real pine.
[Robby spins around and sees Mariko staring at him.]

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: I was thinking about giving those baths another try.
Boy, talk about rude. I could have been sleep walking just now. You know you shouldn’t wake a sleep walker.

StoryElement.StoryElement: Where are you going with all your luggage?.
I thought you had an outdoor sleeping option at this hotel..
My manager’s looking for you. He’s already yelled at me twice today. If he finds you sneaking around at night with your bags, what will he think?
Good point. Can you show me the fastest way out of here?
I know you’re an honest guy. You wouldn’t be trying to sneak out of here would you?

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: I’m just leaving early. Junko said she would pay for all this.
I left my credit card in America I wonder if I can call you when I get back and give you the number.

StoryElement.StoryElement: I know you don’t have a way to pay for all this. This is a five star Japanese hotel. That’s like a six star hotel in America.
If you want to learn about Japanese culture, I can give you your first lesson. If you work here one more day, all debts will be paid.
In America we often ask a simple question in times like these: Are you crazy?
